content.question: Which of the following observations would provide the strongest evidence that two plants belong to different biological species?

choices.label: There are variations in their <math alttext="R N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>R</mtext><mtext>NA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> sequences.
The leaves and flowers show morphological differences.
They produce viable but sterile offspring.
They occupy unique habitats in an ecosystem.

content.answer: They produce viable but sterile offspring.
